column4: hi i was wondering if some1 can help me with installing ubuntu or kubuntu
when i downloaded kubuntu and tried to install it i got this error saying i have a problem with 59 files but when i did the hash check there was no problem
did you try it on a dif. machine? also, did you try to burn another copy (I know the hash is OK, but just in case)?

dunno, but I remember some people having motherboards which weren't supported by Ubuntu. They tried Suse and it was fine (since they make contracts with mb manufacturers). They had similar errors, I believe. Please do check whether your hardware is supported!
Yeah, did you try to turn off acpi? (btw, tnx ziroday)
openSuse is another linux distribution. but don't give up on ubuntu yet! :)
